title: Gretchen L. '81 and Gary K. Sutherland Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide support for undergraduate scholarships for students majoring in chemical and biological engineering. Recipients will be selected in accordance with procedures for need-based scholarships. Awards are for 1 year and are renewable.
marketingContent: To provide support for undergraduate scholarships for students majoring in chemical and biological engineering. Recipients will be selected in accordance with procedures for need-based scholarships. Awards are for 1 year and are renewable.
